department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Translation from English to French, in the field of "Military - Air element"
description: The item covers the following services: Domaine: MIL_AIR; SA-3 WD 10,000,000.000.
full_summary:
#### Tender Announcement for Translation Services
**Reference Number:** PW-__ZF-523-41104
**Tender Number:** EP745-230933/A

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Notice Type Cache:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Description:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada invites interested vendors to bid on a Tender for Translation Services.

**Scope of Work:**
This Invitation to Tender is for the provision of translation services from English to French in the domain of Military - Air element.

**Estimated Volume:**
The estimated volume of the translation services is up to 10,000,000 words, distributed as follows:

* 6,000,000 words for the initial period of three (3) years
* 2,000,000 words for each of the two (2) one-year irrevocable options to extend the contract

**Nature of Requirements:**
The contract will be awarded to a single supplier as a result of this Invitation to Tender.

**Eligible Suppliers:**
Eligible suppliers must be qualified in the Tier 3 - field of Military - Air element, from English to French, in accordance with the conditions of Supply Arrangement EN966-140305.

**Limitations and Exclusions:**
This Invitation to Tender is only accessible to suppliers who are permanently listed or meet the qualification requirements.

**Requirements for Bidders:**
To be eligible to submit a bid, suppliers must have a strong history of delivering translation services in the Military - Air element domain, with a proven track record of meeting quality standards.

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact:
Ménard, Josée (Contracting Authority)
anne.larche@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
(613) 858-7638

**Instructions for Submission:**
All interested suppliers must submit their bids electronically, including all necessary documentation, in either official language of Canada.

**Deadline for Bid Submission:**
The bid submission deadline is 2022-09-28T14:00:00.

The vendor is responsible for complying with all instructions, deadlines, and requirements outlined in this Invitation to Tender.
Please note that this invitation to tender is not yet active, as it has expired.
